name: Internal Dashboard
vision_text: Create an internal dashboard for the company to use that monitors business critical metrics, produces alerts and gives everyone a view of the org health

stories.title: Develop a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for the internal dashboard.

tasks.title: Setup for: Develop a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for the internal dashboard.
tasks.description: Create scaffolding, directories, configs, and basic wiring needed for this story.

tasks.title: Implement: Develop a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for the internal dashboard.
tasks.description: Implement the main logic to satisfy this story.

tasks.title: Validate: Develop a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for the internal dashboard.
tasks.description: Test and verify that all acceptance criteria are met.
